h2_title: Where to Find the Tiger Vanguard
content: As a required boss, you won't be able to proceed to the Chapter 2 End Boss without defeating and him and obtaning one half of the Key Items needed to open various doors in Chapter 2's Yellow Wind Ridge.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Tiger_Vanguard.md', within the main section titled 'Tiger Vanguard', specifically from the subsection 'Where to Find the Tiger Vanguard'.
The content is as follows:
As a required boss, you won't be able to proceed to the Chapter 2 End Boss without defeating and him and obtaning one half of the Key Items needed to open various doors in Chapter 2's Yellow Wind Ridge.
